Package com.frdfsnlght.transporter.api.event

Class Summary
EntityArriveEvent Fired when an entity arrives from a teleport.
EntityDepartEvent Fired when an entity departs from a teleport.
LocalGateCreateEvent Fired when a local gate is created.
LocalGateDestroyEvent Fired when a local gate is destroyed.
LocalPlayerPMEvent Fired when a private message is sent to a local player from another local player.
RemoteGateCreateEvent Fired when a remote gate is created.
RemoteGateDestroyEvent Fired when a remote gate is destroyed.
RemotePlayerChangeWorldEvent Fired when a remote player changes world.
RemotePlayerChatEvent Fired when a remote player sends a chat message that will be received by one or more local players.
RemotePlayerDeathEvent Fired when a remote player dies.
RemotePlayerJoinEvent Fired when a remote player joins.
RemotePlayerKickEvent Fired when a remote player is kicked.
RemotePlayerPMEvent Fired when a private message is sent to a local player from a remote player.
RemotePlayerQuitEvent Fired when a remote player quits.
RemoteServerConnectEvent Fired when a server connects.
RemoteServerDisconnectEvent Fires when a server disconnects.
